item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司（Alaska Airlines）表示，它正在配合美国司法部对波音737 MAX型客机在1月份一次飞行中发生的门板爆裂事件进行刑事调查。
item.description:
Alaska Airlines said it is cooperating with the Justice Dept. in its criminal investigation into the Boeing 737 MAX door-panel blowout during a flight in January https://t.co/u09XMYHPAT pic.twitter.com/8e5HtLq8Px

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 观看：萨姆-奥特曼将重返 OpenAI 董事会。对阿尔特曼 11 月被解雇事件的调查已经结束，该公司表示已经制定了新的治理规则，并加强了利益冲突政策。
item.description:
WATCH: Sam Altman will return to OpenAI's board. An investigation into the events surrounding Altman's November firing concluded, and the company said it has created new governance rules and strengthened its conflict-of-interest policy https://t.co/qOL8LRDd6P pic.twitter.com/SN6rVwcmiZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 观看：全球葡萄酒消费量的下降对澳大利亚的打击尤为严重，因为作为其最大产品的廉价红葡萄酒的需求萎缩最快。作为世界第五大葡萄酒出口国，澳大利亚在 2023 年中期的葡萄酒储量超过 20 亿升。
item.description:
WATCH: Falling consumption of wine worldwide has hit Australia particularly hard as demand shrinks fastest for the cheaper reds that are its biggest product. The world's fifth-largest exporter of wine had more than 2 billion liters in storage in mid-2023 https://t.co/eCVXTIQLhG pic.twitter.com/pGprYQ90OE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 观看：OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）将与三位新董事一起重返 ChatGPT 制造商的董事会
item.description:
WATCH: OpenAI Chief Executive Sam Altman will return to the ChatGPT-maker's board along with three new directors https://t.co/qOL8LRDd6P pic.twitter.com/caUOuhlOph

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 观看：澳大利亚数百万棵葡萄树被毁，还有数千万棵葡萄树必须拔除，以控制过量生产，因为过量生产已经压低了葡萄价格，威胁到种植者和葡萄酒酿造者的生计。
item.description:
WATCH: Millions of vines are being destroyed in Australia and tens of millions more must be pulled up to rein in overproduction that has crushed grape prices and threatened the livelihoods of growers and wine makers https://t.co/eCVXTIRj7e pic.twitter.com/lRc9ZClBGl

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 华尔街周五收盘下跌，S&P 500 指数和纳斯达克指数在盘中触及纪录高点后出现逆转。更多信息
item.description:
Wall Street closed lower on Friday, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq reversing course after touching record highs during the session. Read more https://t.co/S786b4i6HE pic.twitter.com/8uSU32yZtZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 观看：周五，美国 500 指数和纳斯达克指数在盘中触及纪录高点后收盘下跌，高位震荡的芯片股走势反转，喜忧参半的劳动力市场报告显示新增就业岗位多于预期，但失业率有所上升。
item.description:
WATCH: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq closed lower on Friday after touching record highs during the session, with high-flying chip stocks going into reverse and a mixed labor market report that showed more new jobs than expected with a rising unemployment rate https://t.co/S786b4i6HE pic.twitter.com/Usv7jvUZDX

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 谷歌在一本长达 229 页的光鲜亮丽的书中宣传其新的 "湾景 "大楼，强调其尖端功能和 "每个人都拥有成功所需的工具的环境"--但其中缺少了一个关键因素：可靠的 Wi-Fi。更多信息
item.description:
Google promoted its new ‘Bay View’ building in a 229-page glossy book highlighting its cutting-edge features and an ‘environment where everyone has the tools they need to be successful’ – but one crucial element was missing: reliable Wi-Fi. Read more https://t.co/AXF2T9g5Uk pic.twitter.com/cjZFndcKTD

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 从美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）呼吁提高富人税率，到比特币最终创下历史新高，我们将为您盘点本周商业和金融领域的重大事件。
item.description:
From US President Joe Biden's new call for higher taxes on the rich, to bitcoin finally blasting to a new record high, we round up the big stories in business and finance over the week pic.twitter.com/bGxTJlljHs

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 美国雇主在 2 月份强劲地增加了 27.5 万个工作岗位，但失业率升至 3.9% 的两年新高，表明劳动力市场正在放缓。更多信息
item.description:
US employers added a robust 275,000 jobs in February, but an increase in the unemployment rate to a two-year high of 3.9% suggested that the labor market was slowing. Read more https://t.co/ubWJpiBF9Q pic.twitter.com/zEtMlehbTQ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 观看：从美国、中国和英国的最新通胀数据到比特币的波动交易--以下是未来几天商业和金融领域值得关注的重大新闻
item.description:
WATCH: From economic updates with inflation numbers from the US, China, and the UK to bitcoin's volatile trading – here are the major stories to keep an eye on in business and finance in the coming days pic.twitter.com/YldX9RuINF

item.title: 观看：据知情人士透露，日本央行越来越多的决策者正在考虑本月结束负利率的可能性，因为他们预计今年的年度工资讨论将大幅加薪
item.description:
WATCH: A growing number of policymakers at the Bank of Japan are considering the possibility of ending negative interest rates this month because they expect hefty pay hikes in this year's annual wage discussions, according to sources https://t.co/89GJ4Ph0N0 pic.twitter.com/P7ePfUhLKk

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 谷歌一直在吹嘘其新 "湾景 "大楼中的无数创新，甚至将工人迁入大楼，专注于其最受瞩目的项目：生成人工智能。但是，有些人说，他们希望这些创新能包括像样的无线网络。更多信息
item.description:
Google has been touting the myriad innovations in its new ‘Bay View’ building, even moving workers in to focus on its highest-profile project: generative artificial intelligence. But, some say they wish the innovations had included decent Wi-Fi. Read more https://t.co/AXF2T9g5Uk pic.twitter.com/0uTUHhP8QP

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国总统乔-拜登再次呼吁对超级富豪征收 25% 的最低税率，比特币短暂飙升至超过 70,000 美元的历史新高，等等--以下是本周商业和金融方面的热门新闻综述
item.description:
US President Joe Biden renewed his call for a 25% minimum tax on the super wealthy, bitcoin briefly surged to a record high of over $70,000, and more — here's a roundup of the top business and finance stories from this week pic.twitter.com/SX77t0yDv6

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国 2 月份就业岗位增长了 27.5 万个，但这很可能掩盖了劳动力市场的潜在疲软状况，因为失业率升至 3.9% 的两年新高。更多信息
item.description:
US job growth rose by 275,000 in February, but that likely masks underlying softening labor market conditions as the unemployment rate increased to a two-year high of 3.9%. Read more https://t.co/ubWJpiBF9Q pic.twitter.com/n07CSrhjdy

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 挪威为北极浮动风电场项目提供 1.93 亿美元资金
item.description:
Norway offers $193 million funding to Arctic floating wind farm project https://t.co/aKAYLYFlYs pic.twitter.com/IWfqwu7rOu

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 观看：熟悉日本央行想法的四位消息人士称，越来越多的日本央行决策者开始倾向于在本月结束负利率，因为他们预计今年的年度工资谈判将大幅加薪。
item.description:
WATCH: A growing number of Bank of Japan policymakers are warming to the idea of ending negative interest rates this month on expectations of hefty pay hikes in this year's annual wage negotiations, four sources familiar with its thinking said https://t.co/89GJ4Ph0N0 pic.twitter.com/abDC6WR9fv

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 加拿大 2 月份新增就业岗位，工资增长连续第二个月放缓
item.description:
Canada adds jobs in February as wage growth slows for second month in a row https://t.co/poD8zRqPPz pic.twitter.com/KjdRaXnITF

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德暗示，她可能会在 6 月份降低借贷成本，这可能使她成为首位降低借贷成本的主要央行行长。Francesco Guerrera 说，这主要是因为欧洲经济增长缓慢
item.description:
European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde hinted that she might lower borrowing costs in June, which could make her the first major central banker to do so. Francesco Guerrera says that this is mainly because Europe's economy is growing slowly https://t.co/MVHmcp2szI pic.twitter.com/iROgoUi88W

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024

item.title: 观看：行业数据显示，今年头几个月，中国电动汽车销量增长放缓。随着市场领导者比亚迪开始一轮更深入的降价，竞争加剧
item.description:
WATCH: The growth of electric vehicle sales in China showed a slowdown in the initial months of the year, according to industry data. Competition intensified as market leader BYD led a deeper round of price cuts https://t.co/rhlCTbHemI pic.twitter.com/WzsQ9ly6k7

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 8, 2024
